def_cn: （足球或橄榄球比赛中警告犯规球员的）黄牌
def_en: In football or rugby, if a player is shown the yellow card, the referee holds up a yellow card to indicate that the player has broken the rules, and that if they do so again, they will be ordered to leave the pitch.

def_cn: （足球或橄榄球比赛中）对…出示黄牌
def_en: In football or rugby, if a player is yellow carded, they are shown the yellow card by the referee.
